website_summaries.verdict: With a wooden core to support more weight, non-slip base, and recessed hinges, this beam is great for your gymnast and your floors.
pros: Wood core with foam top and synthetic suede cover
Sits flush with the floor on non-slip base
Wood core accommodates heavier weights than foam beams

customer_reviews.title: Kids dig it and easy to put away
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister's kids - one of which is just entering gymnastics. Seemed to make sense because it folds up and can be put in the garage so you don't have an eyesore in the backyard all year long... and its apparently light enough for the kids to move it themselves. She just sent me this video and some pics – looks like they're excited!
customer_reviews.author: smokingmole

customer_reviews.title: Great beam
customer_reviews.text: We got this beam for our 7 year old daughter because it was much less expensive than a raised beam. We were worried that she'd not like it since it wasn't raised, but we were pleasantly surprised that she actually really, really likes it. Because the beam is on the ground, it gives her the confidence to try things she might not have dared to try if it were raised. It has held up well these past 2 months. A good buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: FamilyNurse

customer_reviews.title: Came as described!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely satisfied and pleased with this product! My daughter is 7 and never seems to enter a room without doing a cartwheel. This balance beam is lightweight and easy to move. She herself can fold and unfold it. It has a bag that makes it easy to carry. The material on the beam is soft but just like the gymnastics floor so she doesn’t slip while bounceing around. The non skid bottom does exactly what it says, doesn’t move on any of her tricks, on any of our floors! It’s perfect for what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen S Clark

customer_reviews.title: Balancing Fun and Fitness
customer_reviews.text: Our students paticipate in a "Minds in Motion" program every day. One of their favorite stations is the balance beam. It's the perfect size and easily moved from place to place in the room. Sometimes the grown ups like to try it, too! We are very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elementary School Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Great beam. Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great beam. Super sturdy. Holds me up and I’m 190 lbs. great folding beam and comes with carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Lee Childers

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect beam for a gymnastics beginner. It’s low enough to not worry about our kids as they play on it, but realistic for them to practice their skills on. Love the fold up feature and soft suede. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is 10 and has been in gymnastics for ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 and has been in gymnastics for 2 years having just made a competitive team recently. She LOVES this balance beam to practice on at home
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great starter beam
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 year old is a new budding gymnast. Top of her Christmas list was a balance beam. We decided on this one since there's a 2 year old in the house and felt that an elevated beam would just end in disaster. So far, she's really enjoying it. The quality is great and should last for several years. There are more expensive models out there, but for this price point, it's the best option as it's not an entirely foam core that would surely break down.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Breiner

customer_reviews.title: Best Mom Everrrr
customer_reviews.text: Happy Covid Gift - this beam has not only helped my sunshine beam in administration! She takes care of it safe surroundings and perfection! For a gymnast period. Going back for the whole damn gym lol this purchase absolutely calmed her down since being in house 247. Thanks - work on the timing it took the child counted down my nerves in wait. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Vesha

customer_reviews.title: two nylon handle for easy transport and grippy bottom for safe handling
customer_reviews.text: Highlights: Commercial grade suede + padding, two nylon handle for easy transport and grippy bottom for safe handling. Purchased as a gift for a younger cousin - perfect size for a small home since it folds up into a manageable size for the closet. Loved how it came in a soft cover reminiscent of the bag that Apple uses for their laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1

customer_reviews.title: This beam does the job
customer_reviews.text: This beam is great. It folds in half and can be put in the bag it comes with, so it’s perfect for storing when not being used. My granddaughter loves the beam to practice leaps and other dance moves. She loves this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: This was beam was amazing for my kids (4 and 6). It’s a must have for any children that need to work on balance. It is a great addition to our gym! Their customer service was amazing as well. Great experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but fabric needs to be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: We love this beam, though I wish the fabric and hinges were made of more durable material. Both my daughter and son use it everyday, so it’s getting a work out. Highly recommend storing it in the bag it comes with, especially if you have cats...
customer_reviews.author: CYAMA

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home practice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Both my 8 yr old and 10 yr old have extra room doing cartwheels on this. Sturdy and does not compress even under my weight. Foldable with straps makes it an easy transport to neighbors for additional fun! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great beam
customer_reviews.text: My little gymnast loves this balance beam, easy to put away when not in use and great for training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter's 5th birthday. She has been taking gymnastics lessons for a couple years now and will be so excited to have real equipment to practice on at home. Although she hasn't used it yet because her birthday isn't til next week, It looks well made and of quality materials. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Cameron

customer_reviews.title: My level 4 gymnast loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter who does competitive gymnastics. She says it is very close to the real thing and helps her to learn her routines. I like that it folds up and can be put away.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Randall

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Good, safe beam that does not move around at all when in use. Great ability to store by folding and bag provided.
customer_reviews.author: Greygreyj

customer_reviews.title: Great practice beam - my daughters enjoy using it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great practice beam - my daughters enjoy using it and I like that I can put it away easily since it folds and comes with a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: shellsbells77

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Defective BUT the seller Luvdbaby went above and beyond to make this right.
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought this MOLDED on Christmas morning but the seller Luvdbaby went above and beyond to make this right. Our daughter now has a replacement on the way from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: orangecrush

customer_reviews.title: Broke after the second use
customer_reviews.text: First off when we opened the box with a knife we tore the bag, which was placed right below the tape. I could live with not transporting the beam in a bag though, so that was not a concern. After the second day of use, my daughter was folding the beam up to place it back under the couch and the brackets broke off. This was so upsetting for a six year old who waited three weeks for her beam to arrive. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed mother of a gymnast

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Better quality than I expected for the price. Folds up easily and easily transportable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jungels

customer_reviews.title: Great beam
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Opened in perfect condition. Most importantly, my daughter loves it. Material cover much more realistic than vinyl. Recessed hinges on the fold make my floors love it to. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Learn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beam!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her beam! I love that it folds up easily and slides under our sofa.
customer_reviews.author: MDmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam
customer_reviews.text: Great starter beam! My 2 year old enjoys using it to practice on. Just the right height and length.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Rachelle Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It’s sturdy and my daughter loves it. The folding part makes it very easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Description SPOT ON
customer_reviews.text: The beam is exactly what we were expecting: quality, durability, easy to unfold/fold, and easy to store! There was a zipper bag with handle that came with it, which we did not realize so that was a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Compact Beam!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this!! Practices her gymnastics skills almost everyday. Seems to be made well. Easy cleanup storage ! We don’t have a lot of space, but it fits perfectly behind the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Giammichele

customer_reviews.title: Looks great very stable.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good. Arrived on time. Nice communication form company as a follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this balance beam. She uses it to practice gymnastics. I'm so happy I purchased it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Chuki Posey

customer_reviews.title: Great beam!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter loves this to practice her cartwheels and other balance beam moves in between her gymnastics practices.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My 10 year-old daughter loves it and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Karman

customer_reviews.title: Young gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: Was just perfect for a young gymnast to practice on.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Stachowiak

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Correction. This balance bean came and my granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Waldrum

customer_reviews.title: junior gymnastics balance beam
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a new gymnast to practice on would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leilla

customer_reviews.title: Critical Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: The hinges on the bottom of the beam (see pic) make this unusable on a hardwood floor (you'll kill your floor), and it's not stable on carpet - soooooo.... It's really not suitable on any surface. Overall - not good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reback

customer_reviews.title: My girls love that it’s hard like a real beam but sits ...
customer_reviews.text: My girls love that it’s hard like a real beam but sits on the floor for practicing new skills. Very well made!
customer_reviews.author: chriso31

customer_reviews.title: We love it it feels like the beams at the gym
customer_reviews.text: We love it it feels like the beams at the gym!! Love how it folds up and the carrying case. It was packaged amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: jody722

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This beam was beyond our expectations! Beautiful in quality and perfect for my niece who is just learning or my daughter who is in her 3rd year of competitive gymnastics. 100% recommend this beam. Plus the company is 100% amazing to work with. See my girl in the video.
customer_reviews.author: Tennille

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 yr. old granddaughter she loved it.. I am very pleased with the quality we got the purple and the color is perfect.. I also liked that the company contacted us before it arrived offering their thanks and contact info in case we needed any assistance..I looked at a lot of beams and am so happy that we went with this one..
customer_reviews.author: Amma

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for practicing on the beam without fear of falling. Very study on carpet. Light weight. Store it under the bed & my 6yr old can set it up by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Gallimore

customer_reviews.title: Produce is fine but upset about the condition
customer_reviews.text: A little sad that when I opened the box that there was some gross white substance all over the ends of the carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Love the beam but the carrying case straps came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Love the beam but the strap on the carrying case looks like it has been ripped or cut.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Caldwell

product_meta.title: Junior Gymnastics Balance Beam – 8 Ft Folding Wood Core Low Floor Beam with Anti-Slip Base, Recessed Hinges, Foam Top and Carry Handles
product_meta.description:
Junior Gymnastics Balance Beam – Wooden Core Low Floor Beam

PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT – ALLOW THEM TO GAIN CONFIDENCE

It’s hard for your little gymnast to improve if they only get access to gymnastics equipment for a few hours a week. Our low beam allows them to practice at home to their heart’s content

SAFER BY DESIGN

Your balance beam is extremely safe. Our low beam allows the gymnast to develop their skills at ground level before progressing to the professional balance beam. 

Our beam has a layer of foam on a wood core for a more stable look and feel. Your little one’s feet won’t sink into this beam like on cheap foam models. This also helps to prevent ankle roll, a major cause of injury to little gymnasts

The Junior Gymnastics balance beam also has an Anti-Slip base to prevent slippages as the beam is used

DESIGNED FOR HOME USE

At 4 Foot when folded, your beam can be easily stored anywhere in the home. The beam also has hidden hinges that will not damage wooden floors or your floor tiles. The beam also has carry handles to make carrying from room to room a breeze

Your Junior Gymnast deserves the best balance beam on Amazon. Go on, ADD TO CART and watch your little ones’ face light up
feature_bullets: MORE PRACTICE TIME FOR YOUR BUDDING GYMNAST: Practice makes perfect but we all know that your little gymnast only has access to their gymnastics equipment a few hours per week. Give them an “unfair” advantage by allowing them to practice their beam moves every time they want to

BUILD THEIR CONFIDENCE: Allow your little gymnast to develop their skills at floor level before progressing to a full height beam. The advantage of a floor beam is that a slight slip of their feet won’t damage their little bodies or their confidence. Our low beams have a wood core, foam top and is covered in a premium synthetic suede to give them a real competition feel.

SAFE FOR HOME AND GYM USE: Our balance beam is more stable on the floor as unlike competitors who use plastic feet, our beam sits flush to the floor. The Junior Gymnastics’ floor beam also has a non-slip base to keep your little one safe. The wood core prevents their feet from sinking and helps prevent dangerous ankle rolls like on cheaper foam beams. We also used recessed hinges to protect your hard wood floors and tiles from dents and marks

EXTREMELY VERSATILE FOR ALL THEIR GYMNASTICS MOVES: Our balance beam is a perfect length at eight foot to allow all beam moves. Your little gymnast can practice their Handstands, Walkovers, Donkey Kicks, Jumps, Leaps and Somersaults. Our low beam is an ideal piece of gym equipment for their gymnastics skill development
EASY TO STORE: Our 8 Foot balance beam folds at the hinges to 4 Foot. This makes the beam extremely easy to store behind a sofa, under a bed or in the corner of a room
